Module fi.tuni.prog3.sisu
Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.models

Class StudyModule

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.models.SisuModule
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.models.StudyModule
public class StudyModule extends SisuModule
A class for StudyModules and DegreeProgrammes from the Sisu API. Can hold other StudyModules or CourseModules(courses) under itself. Instantiated from JSON data using Jackson deserializer.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudyModule

      public StudyModule()
      Empty contructor. Actual attributes are set by Jackson API deserializer.

  • Method Details

    • setRule

      public void setRule(RuleModule rule)
      Sets the 'rule' field from Sisu API on this module. This is used to map the StudyModules and CourseModules(courses) under this StudyModule. Should only be used by Jackson.
      Parameters:
      rule - the rule field from Sisu API as a RuleModule instance

    • getChildStudyModules

      public ArrayList<StudyModule> getChildStudyModules() throws NullPointerException
      Gets the StudyModules directly under this module.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containg all StudyModules under this one if the list is not null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the list containing child StudyModules is null

    • getChildCourses

      public ArrayList<CourseModule> getChildCourses() throws NullPointerException
      Gets the CourseModules(courses) directly under this StudyModule.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all CourseModules under this module if the list is not null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the list containing child CourseModules is null

    • buildModuleTree

      public void buildModuleTree()
      Builds a SisuModule tree starting from this StudyModule. Populates the child StudyModule and child CourseModules lists for this module and its children and their children, until all StuduModules and CourseModules starting from this have been generated and mapped. Should be called before trying to use getChildStudyModules or getChildCourses methods.

    • clearModuleTree

      public void clearModuleTree()
      Clears the child StudyModules and child CourseModules lists, destroying the tree starting from this StudyModule. Used to free up memory or otherwise clear unnecessary trees.
